title: Silver Support LFT
body:
Hello,
I am currently a Silver 5 support main looking for a team. I am available Monday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday and Sunday nights and really want to push my skills to the next level, taking advice on fellow members along the way.
Have a decent support champ pool and keen on trying new ones.
Any questions or if you would like to give me a go, comment below or add me in game

Ign: ForeverASupport

Thanks heaps :D

replies.body: oi dude i'm looking to make ranked team, I can duo but would u like to join the team as well?
Im s5 Add me M Zadows. Mid main
hey bud add Hammar97 in game if you are still interested
